mapper.select: select BEES_NO as beesNo, BEES_NAME as beesName, BEES_COVER as beesCover, BEES_CATEGORY as beesCategory, BEES_HOST as beesHost, BEES_PUBLIC_YN as beesPublicYN, BEES_CONT as beesCont, BEES_USER_LIMIT as beesUserLimit, BEES_DEL_YN as beesDelYN, BEES_GENDER as beesGender, BEES_MAX_BIRTH as beesMaxBirth, BEES_MIN_BIRTH as beesMinBirth, BEES_DATE as beesDate, BEES_DEL_DATE as beesDelDate from BEES where BEES_NO = #{beesNo}

select BEES_USER.USER_NO as userNo, BEES_USER.BEES_NO as beesNo, BEES_USER.MEMBER_NO as memberNo, BEES_USER.USER_NAME as userName, BEES_USER.USER_CLASS as userClass, BEES_USER.USER_BLOCK_YN as userBlockYN, BEES_USER.USER_DEL_YN as userDelYN, BEES_USER.USER_AUTH_YN as userAuthYN, MEMBER.MEMBER_ID as memberId, MEMBER.PROFILE_IMG as profileImg from Bees_User left join bees On bees_user.bees_no=bees.bees_no left join member On bees_user.member_no=member.member_no where bees_user.BEES_NO=#{beesNo} and bees_user.user_del_yn='N' and bees_user.user_auth_yn='Y'

select BEES_USER.USER_NO as userNo, BEES_USER.BEES_NO as beesNo, BEES_USER.MEMBER_NO as memberNo, BEES_USER.USER_NAME as userName, BEES_USER.USER_CLASS as userClass, BEES_USER.USER_BLOCK_YN as userBlockYN, BEES_USER.USER_DEL_YN as userDelYN, BEES_USER.USER_AUTH_YN as userAuthYN, MEMBER.MEMBER_ID as memberId, MEMBER.PROFILE_IMG as profileImg from Bees_User left join bees On bees_user.bees_no=bees.bees_no left join member On bees_user.member_no=member.member_no where bees_user.BEES_NO=#{beesNo} and bees_user.user_class='manager' and bees_user.user_del_yn='N' and bees_user.user_auth_yn='Y'

select BEES_USER.USER_NO as userNo, BEES_USER.BEES_NO as beesNo, BEES_USER.MEMBER_NO as memberNo, BEES_USER.USER_NAME as userName, BEES_USER.USER_CLASS as userClass, BEES_USER.USER_BLOCK_YN as userBlockYN, BEES_USER.USER_DEL_YN as userDelYN, BEES_USER.USER_AUTH_YN as userAuthYN, MEMBER.MEMBER_ID as memberId, MEMBER.PROFILE_IMG as profileImg from Bees_User left join bees On bees_user.bees_no=bees.bees_no left join member On bees_user.member_no=member.member_no where bees_user.BEES_NO=#{beesNo} and bees_user.user_class='user' and bees_user.user_del_yn='N' and bees_user.user_auth_yn='Y'

select BEES_USER.USER_NO as userNo, BEES_USER.BEES_NO as beesNo, BEES_USER.MEMBER_NO as memberNo, BEES_USER.USER_NAME as userName, BEES_USER.USER_CLASS as userClass, BEES_USER.USER_BLOCK_YN as userBlockYN, BEES_USER.USER_DEL_YN as userDelYN, BEES_USER.USER_AUTH_YN as userAuthYN, MEMBER.MEMBER_ID as memberId, MEMBER.PROFILE_IMG as profileImg from Bees_User left join bees On bees_user.bees_no=bees.bees_no left join member On bees_user.member_no=member.member_no where bees_user.BEES_NO=#{beesNo} and bees_user.user_block_yn='Y' and bees_user.user_del_yn='Y' and bees_user.user_auth_yn='Y'

select SET_NO as setNO, BEES_NO as beesNo, SET_NOTICE as setNotice, SET_WRITE as setWrite, SET_COMMENT as setComment, SET_CONT_DEL as setContDel, SET_SCHE_REGIST as setScheRegist, SET_SCHE_MODIFY as setScheModify, SET_CHAT_OPEN as setChatOpen, SET_CHAT_DEL as setChatDel, SET_USER_INVITE as setUserInvite, SET_USER_PERMIT as setUserPermit, SET_USER_CONDI as setUserCondi, SET_USER_BLOCK as setUserBlock from SETTING where BEES_NO = #{beesNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE BEES_USER SET USER_DEL_YN='Y' where MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} and BEES_NO = #{beesNo}
UPDATE BEES SET BEES_DEL_YN='Y', BEES_DEL_DATE=SYSTIMESTAMP where BEES_NO = #{beesNo}

UPDATE SETTING SET SET_NOTICE = #{setNotice}, SET_WRITE = #{setWrite}, SET_COMMENT = #{setComment}, SET_CONT_DEL = #{setContDel}, SET_SCHE_REGIST = #{setScheRegist}, SET_SCHE_MODIFY = #{setScheModify}, SET_CHAT_OPEN = #{setChatOpen}, SET_CHAT_DEL = #{setChatDel}, SET_USER_INVITE = #{setUserInvite}, SET_USER_PERMIT = #{setUserPermit}, SET_USER_CONDI = #{setUserCondi}, SET_USER_BLOCK = #{setUserBlock} where BEES_NO = #{beesNo}
UPDATE BEES_USER SET USER_CLASS='user' where MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} and BEES_NO = #{beesNo}
UPDATE BEES_USER SET USER_DEL_YN='Y' where MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} and BEES_NO = #{beesNo}
UPDATE BEES_USER SET USER_BLOCK_YN='Y', USER_DEL_YN='Y' where MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} and BEES_NO = #{beesNo}
UPDATE BEES_USER SET USER_BLOCK_YN='N', USER_DEL_YN='Y' where MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} and BEES_NO = #{beesNo}
UPDATE BEES_USER SET USER_CLASS='manager' where MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} and BEES_NO = #{beesNo}
mapper.select: SELECT BEES_NO AS beesNo, BEES_NAME AS beesName, BEES_COVER AS beesCover, BEES_CATEGORY AS beesCategory, BEES_HOST AS beesHost, BEES_PUBLIC_YN AS beesPublicYN, BEES_CONT AS beesCont, BEES_USER_LIMIT AS beesUserLimit, BEES_DEL_YN AS beesDelYN, BEES_GENDER AS beesGender, BEES_MAX_BIRTH AS beesMaxBirth, BEES_MIN_BIRTH AS beesMinBirth, BEES_DATE AS beesDate, BEES_DEL_DATE AS beesDelDate FROM BEES WHERE BEES_NO IN (SELECT BEES_NO FROM BEES_USER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND USER_BLOCK_YN = 'N' AND USER_DEL_YN = 'N' AND USER_AUTH_YN = 'Y')

SELECT B.BEES_NO AS beesNo, B.BEES_NAME AS beesName, B.BEES_COVER AS beesCover, B.BEES_CATEGORY AS beesCategory, B.BEES_HOST AS beesHost, B.BEES_PUBLIC_YN AS beesPublicYN, B.BEES_CONT AS beesCont, B.BEES_USER_LIMIT AS beesUserLimit, B.BEES_DEL_YN AS beesDelYN, B.BEES_GENDER AS beesGender, B.BEES_MAX_BIRTH AS beesMaxBirth, B.BEES_MIN_BIRTH AS beesMinBirth, B.BEES_DATE AS beesDate, B.BEES_DEL_DATE AS beesDelDate, NVL(BU.COUNT, 0) as beesUserCount FROM BEES B LEFT JOIN (SELECT BEES_NO, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BEES_USER GROUP BY BEES_NO ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) BU ON B.BEES_NO = BU.BEES_NO WHERE B.BEES_CATEGORY = #{category} AND B.BEES_NO != (SELECT BEES_NO FROM BEES_USER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{sessionMemberNo}) AND B.BEES_PUBLIC_YN = 'N'

SELECT B.BEES_NO AS beesNo, B.BEES_NAME AS beesName, B.BEES_COVER AS beesCover, B.BEES_CATEGORY AS beesCategory, B.BEES_HOST AS beesHost, B.BEES_PUBLIC_YN AS beesPublicYN, B.BEES_CONT AS beesCont, B.BEES_USER_LIMIT AS beesUserLimit, B.BEES_DEL_YN AS beesDelYN, B.BEES_GENDER AS beesGender, B.BEES_MAX_BIRTH AS beesMaxBirth, B.BEES_MIN_BIRTH AS beesMinBirth, B.BEES_DATE AS beesDate, B.BEES_DEL_DATE AS beesDelDate, NVL(BU.COUNT, 0) as beesUserCount FROM BEES B LEFT JOIN (SELECT BEES_NO, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BEES_USER GROUP BY BEES_NO ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) BU ON B.BEES_NO = BU.BEES_NO WHERE B.BEES_NAME like ('%'||#{searchData}||'%') AND B.BEES_PUBLIC_YN = 'N'

select bees_no as beesNo, bees_name as beesName, bees_cover as beesCover, bees_category as beesCategory, bees_host as beesHost, bees_public_yn as beesPublicYN, bees_cont as beesCont, bees_user_limit as beesUserLimit, bees_del_yn as beesDelYN, bees_gender as beesGender, bees_max_birth as beesMaxBirth, bees_min_birth as beesMinBirth from bees where bees_no = #{bees_no} and bees_del_yn='N'
